                                            int port)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
Binds an internal connection to a specific address and port.

Parameters:
address - the address to bind the connection, as an IPv4 string.
port - the port to bind the connection
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the IP address is invalid (not IPv4)

unbind

public org.jboss.netty.channel.group.ChannelGroupFuture unbind()

Returns:
a ChannelGroupFuture representing the unbinding event.

unbind

public org.jboss.netty.channel.ChannelFuture unbind(java.net.SocketAddress address)
Unbinds the specified internal connection.

Parameters:
address - the SocketAddress that the connection is bound to
Returns:
a ChannelFuture representing the unbinding event.

shutdown

public void shutdown()
Shutdowns all internal connections completely, and frees up resources used by the bootstrapper.
